lines.text: declare long longs n and m
let a , b and c be long longs
create long long ans with value = max of 0 and b + ( 2 * a ) - n
lines.code: long long ans = max ( ( long long ) 0 , b + ( 2 * a ) - n ) ;

lines.text: increase ans by max of 0 and b + ( 3 * c ) - m
lines.code: ans += max ( ( long long ) 0 , b + ( 3 * c ) - m ) ;

lines.text: print ans and a new line
